structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.text: To become a certificate holder under KRS 198B.560, an applicant must satisfactorily pass a current examination prescribed and administered by the National Institute for Certification in Engineering Technologies entitled Fire Protection Engineering Technology Automatic Sprinkler System Design Level III, or the equivalent thereof, approved by the commissioner.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 276, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 82, sec. 7, effective July 15, 2008. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 383, sec. 5, effective July 13, 1984.
